name: Ulamur
description:
This adventure was designed to be used with any Low Fantasy OSR TTRPG ruleset of your choice with minor adjustments. We choose MSX™ and Age of Gods but you can use other games like Old Kingdom 2nd Edition, Monster Slayer or Iron & Fire™.

MSX™
Age of Gods
Old Kingdom 2nd Edition
Monster Slayer
Iron & Fire™

Download the adventure excerpt below.
